languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш, изгнанник Комморры и убийца собственного кабала, недолго пробыл в свите Вольного Торговца. Опустошенный многочисленными потерями, не способный избавиться от горечи несбывшихся амбиций, друкари нашел упоение в иной роли. Говорят, он покинул флагман фон Валанциус в компании таинственного пестрого ксеноса — того же, что в тот день увел за собой Ирлиэт Ланэвисс. Для летописей Империума участь Маражая скрыта мраком, и только Смеющемуся богу Цегораху ведомо, что с исчезновением Азуриани и друкари в недрах Паутины родились две новые маски Арлекина.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. People say he left the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty in the company of a mysterious and colourful xenos — the same one who took Yrliet Lanaevyss on the same day. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

Broken by the many losses, unable to cope with the bitterness of unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. Imperium chronicles know nothing about the fate of Marazhai, and only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new masks of Harlequin were born.

languages.text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，科摩罗的流放者，在摧毁了自己的阴谋团之后，并没有在行商浪人的队伍中停留太久。由于失去了太多，而未竟野心所带来的痛苦又无法满足，这位黑暗灵族找到了另外的道路，在新的道路上找到了无上的喜悦。人们说，他跟着某个五颜六色的神秘异形离开了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的旗舰，而在同一天，那位神秘的异形还带走了伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝。帝国的编年史家对玛拉斋的命运一无所知。只有笑神乔高奇知道，那位方舟灵族与黑暗灵族已经彻底消失不见，网道深处多了两位新的丑角。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. People say he left the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty in the company of a mysterious and colourful xenos — the same one who took Yrliet Lanaevyss on the same day. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，科摩罗的流放者，在摧毁了自己的阴谋团之后，并没有在行商浪人的队伍中停留太久。由于失去了太多，而未竟野心所带来的痛苦又无法满足，这位黑暗灵族找到了另外的道路，在新的道路上找到了无上的喜悦。人们说，他跟着某个五颜六色的神秘异形离开了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的旗舰，而在同一天，那位神秘的异形还带走了伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝。帝国的编年史家对玛拉斋的命运一无所知。只有笑神乔高奇知道，那位方舟灵族与黑暗灵族已经彻底消失不见，网道深处多了两位新的丑角。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Mörder seiner eigenen Kabale, aus Commorragh verbannt, blieb nicht lange im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Seine vielen Verluste hatten ihn gebrochen, zudem konnte er es nicht verkraften, dass seine Ambitionen nicht erfüllt hatten. Der Drukhari fand Entrückung in einer anderen Rolle. Es heißt, er habe das Flaggschiff der Valancius-Dynastie in Begleitung einer mysteriösen und farbenfrohen Xenos verlassen — derselben, die am selben Tag auch Yrliet Lanaevyss mitgenommen hat. Die Chronisten des Imperiums wissen nichts über Marazhais Schicksal. Nur der Lachende Gott Cegorach weiß, dass durch das Verschwinden der Asuryani und des Drukhari in den Tiefen des Netzes der Tausend Tore zwei neue Harlekin-Masken geboren wurden.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Mörder seiner eigenen Kabale, aus Commorragh verbannt, blieb nicht lange im Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Seine vielen Verluste hatten ihn gebrochen, zudem konnte er es nicht verkraften, dass seine Ambitionen nicht erfüllt hatten. Der Drukhari fand Entrückung in einer anderen Rolle. Es heißt, er habe das Flaggschiff der Valancius-Dynastie in Begleitung einer mysteriösen und farbenfrohen Xenos verlassen — derselben, die am selben Tag auch Yrliet Lanaevyss mitgenommen hat. Nur der Lachende Gott Cegorach weiß, dass durch das Verschwinden der Asuryani und des Drukhari in den Tiefen des Netzes der Tausend Tore zwei neue Harlekin-Masken geboren wurden.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exilé de Commorragh et meurtrier de sa propre Kabale, ne s'attarda pas aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Brisé par ses nombreuses déceptions et incapable de faire face à la rancœur engendrée par ses ambitions inassouvies, le Drukhari s'épanouit dans un autre rôle. On dit qu'il quitta le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius aux côtés d'un xénos mystérieux vêtu d'une tenue colorée. Le même jour, ce dernier emmena également Yrliet Lanaevyss. Les chroniques de l'Imperium ne contiennent aucune autre mention du destin de Marazhai. Seul Cegorach, le Dieu Moqueur, sait que la disparition de l'Asuryani et du Drukhari engendra l'apparition de deux nouveaux Arlequins masqués dans les profondeurs de la Toile.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Brisé par ses nombreuses déceptions et incapable de faire face à la rancœur engendrée par ses ambitions inassouvies, le Drukhari s'épanouit dans un autre rôle. On dit qu'il quitta le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius aux côtés d'un xénos mystérieux vêtu d'une tenue colorée. Le même jour, ce dernier emmena également Yrliet Lanaevyss. Les chroniques de l'Imperium ne contiennent aucune autre mention du destin de Marazhai. Seul Cegorach, le Dieu Moqueur, sait que la disparition de l'Asuryani et du Drukhari engendra l'apparition de deux nouveaux arlequins masqués dans les profondeurs de la Toile.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exiliado de Commorragh y asesino de su propia Kábala, no permaneció mucho tiempo en el séquito {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Atormentado por sus numerosas pérdidas e incapaz de soportar la amargura de sus ambiciones fallidas, el Drukhari encontró su lugar desempeñando otro papel. La gente dice que abandonó la nave insignia de la dinastía von Valancius junto a un xenos misterioso y colorido; el mismo que se llevó a Yrliet Lanaevyss aquel día. Las crónicas del Imperium no contienen información sobre el destino de Marazhai. Solo el dios que ríe, Cegorach, sabe que, con la desaparición de la Asuryani y el Drukhari, nacieron dos nuevas mascaradas de Arlequines en las profundidades de la Telaraña.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. People say he left the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty in the company of a mysterious and colourful xenos — the same one who took Yrliet Lanaevyss on the same day. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

La gente dice que abandonó la nave insignia de la dinastía von Valancius junto a un xenos misterioso y colorido; el mismo que se llevó a Yrliet Lanaevyss aquel día. Las crónicas del Imperium no contienen información sobre el destino de Marazhai. languages.text: コモラフからの亡命者であり、自らの陰謀団を殺害したマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、ローグトレーダーの配下に長く留まることはなかった。多くの敗北に打ちひしがれ、果たせなかった野望の苦しさに耐えかねたデュカーリは、別の役割に歓喜を見出した。人々は、彼がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の旗艦を、謎めいた多彩なゼノと共に去ったと言う。丁度、同じ日にユリエット・ラナエフィスを連れ去ったゼノと。帝国の年代記はマラズハイの運命について何も知らない。アシュリヤーニとデュカーリの消滅とともに、網辻の奥深くで2つの新たなハーレクィン・マスクが誕生したことを知るのは、〈笑う神〉セゴラックだけである。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. People say he left the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty in the company of a mysterious and colourful xenos — the same one who took Yrliet Lanaevyss on the same day. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

traits.locale_text: コモラフからの亡命者であり、自らの陰謀団を殺害したマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、ローグトレーダーの配下に長く留まることはなかった。多くの敗北に打ちひしがれ、果たせなかった野望の苦しさに耐えかねたデュカーリは、別の役割に歓喜を見出した。人々は、彼がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の旗艦を、謎めいた多彩なゼノと共に去ったと言う。丁度、同じ日にユリエット・ラナエフィスを連れ去ったゼノと。帝国の年代記はマラズハイの運命について何も知らない。アシュリヤーニとデュカーリの消滅とともに、網辻の奥深くで2つの新たなハーレクィン・マスクが誕生したことを知るのは、〈笑う神〉セゴラックだけである。

languages.text: Commorragh'tan sürgün edilen ve kendi Kabal'ını katleden Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde çok uzun süre kalmadı. Kaybettikleri nedeniyle perişan olan ve yerine getiremediği arzularının yarattığı acılarla başa çıkamayan Drukhari, tatmini başka bir yerde buldu. Von Valancius hanesinin sancak gemisinden; aynı gün Yrliet Lanaevyss'i de alan, gizemli ve renkli bir zenoyla birlikte ayrıldığı söylenir oldu. İmparatorluk vakayinamelerinde, Marazhai'a ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Asuryani ve Drukhari'nin kayboluşunun ardından Ağyol'un derinliklerinde iki yeni Arleken maskeli balosu ortaya çıktığını ise yalnızca Gülen Tanrı Cegorach biliyor.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, exile from Commorragh and murderer of his own Kabal, did not remain in the Rogue Trader's retinue for long. Broken by his many losses and unable to cope with the bitterness of his unfulfilled ambitions, the Drukhari found rapture in another role. People say he left the flagship of the von Valancius dynasty in the company of a mysterious and colourful xenos — the same one who took Yrliet Lanaevyss on the same day. The Imperium's chronicles know nothing of the fate of Marazhai. Only the Laughing God Cegorach knows that with the disappearance of the Asuryani and Drukhari, in the depths of the Webway two new Harlequin masques were born.

traits.locale_text: Commorragh'tan sürgün edilen ve kendi Kabal'ını katleden Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinde çok uzun süre kalmadı. Kaybettikleri nedeniyle perişan olan ve yerine getiremediği arzularının yarattığı acılarla başa çıkamayan Drukhari, tatmini başka bir yerde buldu. İnsanlar von Valancius hanesinin sancak gemisinden, gizemli ve renkli bir zenoyla birlikte ayrıldığını söylüyordu. Aynı gün Yrliet Lanaevyss'i de alan zenoyla. İmparatorluk vakayinameleri, Marazhai'a ne olduğunu bilmiyor. Asuryani ve Drukhari'nin ortadan yok oluşunun ardından, Ağyol'un derinliklerinde iki yeni Arleken maskeli balosu doğduğunu ise yalnızca Gülen Tanrı Cegorach biliyor.
